techmeme.title: Nintendo unveils Switch 2 details: a 7.9", 120fps, 1080p display, larger Joy-Con controllers, 256GB of storage, 4K games at 60fps when docked, launching June 5 (Jay Peters/The Verge)

UFC signs a wide-ranging, multimillion-dollar, multiple-year sponsorship deal with Meta, which will be its "official fan technology partner" (Alex Sherman/CNBC)
Roblox rolls out new parental controls, including to let parents block and report people on their child's friends list, building on changes it made in 2024 (Jay Peters/The Verge)
